item.description:
Salons are vital to the fashion and beauty economies.

They make individuals feel better about themselves through the art of hair styling. Skillful stylists transform and tame the madness that is ones hair and craft it into a living breathing style element all its own.

We all know that a bad hair day can make or break even the most magnificent garments, and turn marvelous ensembles in mediocre fair.

This level of importance has prompted us to organize Boston's very first Salon Walk.

We will be visiting a number of Prominent Copley area Salons to hear from the owners and managers as they discuss what it is like running a salon, talk about clientele, their role in Boston fashion, and answer any questions you may have.

Current Salon's include

James Joseph Salon (Owner, William George)

30 Newbury Street
Boston, MA, 02116
Phone: 617.266.7222 Fax:
Email: info@jamesjosephsalon.com
http://www.jamesjosep...

Salon Acote (Owner, Alex Safar)

132 Newbury Street
Boston, MA, 02116
Phone: (617) 262-5111 Fax:
Email: info@salonacote.com)
http://www.salonacote...

Mizu Boston (General Manager, Lindsey Berry)

Mandarin Oriental Hotel
776 Boylston Street
Boston, MA 02199
Phone: 617.585.6498
Email: info@mizuboston.com
http://www.mizuboston...
item.how_to_find_us: We will greet you. Make sure you RSVP Yes so that we know you are coming.
item.name: Boston Salon Walk - August Meetup
